about_the_game:
🎮 Welcome to ETHERNITY: The Ultimate PvP Experience 🎮

Game Overview

ETHERNITY is a cutting-edge, third person shooter battle royale designed for the most competitive players. Dive into a world where your skill, strategy, and reflexes are tested against both human and AI opponents. Customize your avatar, dominate thrilling e-sports events, and rise to the top in a game that pushes the limits of next-gen gaming.

🔥 Key Features 🔥

🔹 Realistic AI Avatars: Play and engage in conversations with AI-powered characters.

🔹 Dynamic PvP Combat: Engage in high-octane battles across multiple game modes. Team up or go solo in action-packed matches that blend intense player combat.

🔹 Competitive Tournaments: Battle it out in e-sports tournaments with global leaderboards. Prove yourself as the top player and claim exclusive rewards.

🔹 In-Game Rewards: Win big! Earn valuable in-game currency for dominating your enemies and achieving top ranks.

⚔️ Game Modes ⚔️

🌍 Battle Royale: Leap from the skies with your Jetpack onto Island of Elite, and fight to be the last one standing! With up to 200 players, this next-gen Battle Royale is all about strategy, precision, and survival as the zone shrinks, and the action intensifies.

🔄 Elimination: No parachutes needed! Spawn on the map with 4 lives and face relentless combat as the shrinking battlefield forces you closer to your enemies. Only the strongest will claim victory.

💥 Deathmatch: In this classic mode, it's every player for themselves. Rack up 25 kills before anyone else! Use your Jetpack to dominate the battlefield, and show everyone who’s boss.

🌟 Features That Set You Apart 🌟

🔹 Up to 200 players in one match

🔹 Fly across the battlefield with a Jetpack

🔹 Cutting-edge servers with lag compensation

🔹 A variety of weapons, from pistols to sniper rifles

🔹 A breathtaking futuristic environment

🌍 Storyline 🌍

In 2052, the world is on the brink of collapse, and survival is the only option. Enter ETHERNITY, the deadly island created by The Elite—a cabal of the world’s richest leaders. Here, players from around the world compete in survival tournaments, battling both each other and AI enemies for glory. Will you uncover the secrets behind The Elite and claim your place as the ultimate champion?

🏆 Join the Ultimate Challenge 🏆

🌟 Compete in high-stakes events for life-changing rewards!

🔍 Uncover the dark secrets of ETHERNITY and The Elite!

⚔️ Prove you have what it takes to be the best!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features intense violence, including frequent depictions of killing with a significant amount of blood. Additionally, the game contains a large number of sexualized female characters dressed in revealing outfits and portrayed in suggestive poses. While there is partial nudity, there is no explicit mature sexual content in the game.

name: ETHERNITY

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires stable internet connection for online play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires stable internet connection for online play.

short_description: ETHERNITY is a competitive cross-platform eSports Battle Royale and Deathmatch shooter. Customize AI avatars, use Jetpacks, and fight up to 200 players in intense PvP tournaments.
